Holiday Money Get in touch Book a video call Make an enquiry Call 0800 713 715 Help Get in touch Back BREAKFAST DAILY ADD ON View gallery / Back Sudamala Resort Komodo - Aerial Sudamala Resort Komodo - Pool Komodo Dragon Flores Islands - Labuan Bajo Pink Beach Labuan Bajo Komodo Island Sudamala Resort Komodo &vert; Return flights • Transfers • 3 Nights • Breakfast daily Overview Inclusions Room Type Terms & Conditions Sudamala Resort Komodo - Labuan Bajo Nestled on the pristine coastline of Labuan Bajo and located an easy 10-minute drive from the airport, Sudamala Resort, Komodo serves as the perfect gateway to the world-renowned Komodo National Park. Designed with a boutique touch, the resort combines modern comfort with authentic local charm, offering a true sense of place. Guests can immerse themselves in Flores’ breathtaking natural beauty—crystal-clear waters, vibrant marine life, and dramatic landscapes—while also experiencing the warmth of local culture and traditions. Whether relaxing in their elegantly designed suites, indulging in curated dining experiences, or setting off on unforgettable adventures, Sudamala Resort, Komodo is where discovery meets serenity. Labuan Bajo (Known as Komodo Island) Labuan Bajo is worth visiting because it combines adventure and beauty in one place. From exploring the legendary Komodo dragons and diving in crystal-clear waters full of manta rays and coral reefs, to sailing across stunning islands and enjoying unforgettable sunsets over the Flores Sea. View more View less 3 nights + domestic flights, transfers, breakfast & more from $ 1269 per person share twin. International flights are additional BREAKFAST DAILY ADD ON Enquire now Sale Period : until 4pm on 30 Nov 25 or until sold out Your stay at Sudamala Resort Komodo Includes: Return Economy class airfares flying Batik Air from Denpasar to Labuan Bajo Return airport to hotel transfers (based on the hotel schedule) Welcome drink on arrival 3 nights accommodation in a Kelimutu Deluxe Suite Breakfast daily WiFi One full-day excursion program by Aqura Dive for 2 persons, including visits to Padar Island, Pink Beach, Komodo National Park, and snorkelling at Manta Point. Including Lunch, fruit & refreshments. *Day tour - Please note there will be an additional park fee or entrance fee payable direct. Room Types Kelimutu Deluxe Suite The Kelimutu Deluxe Suite at Sudamala Resort Komodo offers a luxurious retreat with a private balcony, stunning views, and elegant amenities, perfect for unwinding after exploring Komodo’s natural wonders. 3 night package from $1269 per person share twin. International flights are additional Travel 01 Nov - 26 Dec 25, 06 Jan - 30 Jun 26 If the advertised room type doesn't suit, or you'd like to travel outside the advertised dates, please ask us for a customised quote below. Terms & Conditions Valid for new bookings until 4pm on 30 Nov 25 or until sold out • Prices are correct as at 23 Sep 25 • Prices are thereafter subject to change without notice until time of confirmation • Prices may vary due to a number of factors including tax and surcharge increases, exchange rate movements and availability • Day tour - Please note there will be an additional park fee or entrance fee payable direct. *The current estimate is IDR 485,000 nett per person per day. Please note that this is subject to change based on the local authority. All travel must be commenced and completed as specified. Advertised packages are based on return Domestic flight between Bali and Labuan Bajo is based on Batik Air in Economy Class • International flights are additional • Any additional nights accommodation required due to flight schedules are at the customers expense. Day of the week surcharges may apply. • Min/max stays apply • Some surcharges, closeouts and accommodation restrictions apply • Bedding configurations may vary on twin share options • Twin share is two adults sharing a room using existing bedding • Advertised prices are per person for cash or eftpos purchase only. Credit card fees will apply • Full payment is required at time of booking • Airfares are non-refundable and non transferable • Airfares and Accommodation are limited and subject to availability at time of booking • Please ask your House of Travel consultant for full details.
